flawed_nl_solution:
Mandy has a total of $20 x 3 = $<<20*3=60>>60.
So, she will have $60/$10 = <<60/10=6>>6 $10 bills.
Manny has a total of $50 x 2 = $<<50*2=1000>>1000.
So, he will have $1000/$10 = <<1000/10=100>>100 $10 bills.
Hence, Manny has 100 - 6 = <<100-6=94>>94 more $10 bills than Mandy.
#### 94

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
